Articles.Content:
Kerbal eyes now move independently of their heads! I just installed texture replacer to remove the helmets and i saw as i ran around the eyes are no longer static! Awesome touch SQUAD. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)

To do this your self, simply put a kerbal on EVA and walk them around a bit making turns and be amazed!

![XRURWza.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XRURWza.jpg)

They still don't blink though....

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-28T21:42:48Z" title="04/28/2015 09:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 28, 2015</time> by worir4**
Cool! Another little feature to make the game even better!

3: "You must spread some Reputation around before giving it to worir4 again."

- - - Updated - - -

...Now to get Val to cross one eye

Like this guy:

Lol, I am off to bed now but tomorrow I will try this. It's kind of hard to get a screen shot because it is only brief. I will try until my hard drive fills up!
